name: The Evidence Room
description:
Because of budget cuts, all the police department's evidence is stored in one room: "The Evidence Room"

A game I made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 37.

Ludum Dare is a game jam where game developers are presented with a theme, and given a limitied amount of time to make a game based around that theme.

This time the theme was "One Room."

Controls:

  • Mouse
